name: WebGL2RenderingContext.invalidateSubFramebuffer
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.invalidateSubFramebuffer() method of the WebGL 2 API invalidates portions of the contents of attachments in a framebuffer.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'invalidateSubFramebuffer' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 3.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glInvalidateSubFramebuffer' in the 'OpenGL ES 3.0' specification.
